title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, July 11, 2021
description: The author of “Stuart Little” and “Charlotte's Web”, E.B. White, was born on this day 1899. He was also a prolific essayist and contributor to the New Yorker magazine.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
